body: "Hands shaking with Parkinson’s offer sugary snacks at bus stops, wrinkled faces offer razor blades for only five pesos": Generation Y says that the system the elderly helped to build "cannot provide them with a dignified old age."
original_body: "Hands shaking with Parkinson’s offer sugary snacks at bus stops, wrinkled faces offer razor blades for only five pesos": Generation Y says that the system the elderly helped to build "cannot provide them with a dignified old age."
title: Cuba: Old Age in Cuba
